name: Kenny vs. Spenny: Versusville
summary:
Based on the TV series Kenny vs Spenny (starring Kenny Hotz and Spencer Rice), Versusville is free to play and features 4 different games that can be played in real time in either single or multiplayer online modes.

The four games are Residence Evil, Wasteball, Kart Dart & Grave Rave. High scores were featured on the website for the game when it was active.
